forum.content:
Oh, I finally to figure out how to explain this app , it kind like a little ecosystem,

it's contained Flies , Bee and Mosquitoes.

Flies try to make a sexualrelation with shit.
Bee try to make a sexualrelation with flowers.
Mosquitoes try to suck your blood.

But it also contained some lovely , friendly and kindness, and sometime they just hiding behind the something ugly and their are easily to ignored,

something is really ugly, I know, that is true ugly, but I still believe that something beautiful and kindness are waiting for your discovery.

Wait, are you mean what is my characters here?

I'm a piece of shit here, that's definitely to believe .

Am I right ?

I know my grammar is terrible, but I still remained my positive.

If you don't mind, I hope to see your comment or opinions , please let me know your idea below the comments.

I do know mandarins and I glad to see it.

Thank you and have a good day.
forum.title: ECOSYSTEMS
